name: DataSet
shortdesc: A set of variables and their associated dynamic data which will be used for dynamic publishing.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

method.name: display
method.shortdesc: Displays the dynamic data that has been captured in the dataset.

method.name: update
method.shortdesc: Re-apply the dynamic data of the active dataset to the artboard.
